content: off braids cut 3 lengths of yarn about 30 long 3 for each side if you are feeling reckless you can add more with the right side of the scarf facing you insert your hook from back to front at one of the end points double your 3 strands so they form a loop in the middle place this loop over your hook photo 1 and pull the loop through photo 2 now yarn over with all the strands of yarn photo 3 and pull them through the loop photo 4 tighten divide into 3 groups of 2 and braid until you have about 3 inches left make a knot and trim your tassel
